# Background
The informal survey was conducted over five days between 6/10 and 6/14 of 2019. It was publicized on twitter and facebook on my (Chris Marcum) feeds with targetted and cascade sampling biases. As of 6/15/2019 there were 35 respondents.

[Original Live Survey Here](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdf1GZfRETYr-n0-BNSnPipBQCCQXvRaDDcjV1Ht4E5Ec46qQ/viewform?usp=sf_link)
